content:
The First Word.
I wonder what the first word was.
Who spoke the first word? How long ago? Was it "hello"? Or was it "goodbye"? Ever since that first word, people have been talking.
I think I know what the first word was.
Someone was cooking on a fire and burned himself.
"Ouch!!!"

I Can't Stop! Bob has a problem.
At supper time, his mom puts out a lot of food on the table.
He just can't stop eating.
Soon, he eats too much.
"Mom, what should I do?" Bob asks.
His mom says, "I will make small meals from now on.
That way, you won't have the problem of overeating." "Good idea, Mom," Bob says.

A Bird and a Cat.
I have a little blue bird.
She lives in a cage in my room.
She is a beautiful bird.
She likes to sing, and she likes me.
But she does not like my cat.
She is a happy bird.
I enjoy listening to my bird's singing.
But when my cat comes in the room, the bird stops singing.
She is quiet.
She sits and watches the cat.
I think she is afraid of the cat.

Save the World.
One day, Simon's mother asks him what he wants to do when he grows up.
"Save the world!" he says.
His mother smiles and says, "I'm glad to hear that.
But can you save your world first?" "What?" asks Simon.
"Clean up your room, can you do that?" says the mother.
"Yes...
I can!" says Simon.

Everything Is New! When the first baby is born, everything is new.
With a new baby, there is a new mother and new father.
There is also a new grandfather and grandmother, a new uncle and new aunt.
The new parents have to prepare a new bed and new clothes and new toys for the new baby.
Everything is new!

A Windy Christmas.
Christmas was very different this year.
On Christmas Day, there was no snow or ice.
It was a windy day.
The wind was so strong, I could not even walk on the street.
I had to run! The strong wind pushed me all the way home.
I think the wind pushed Santa Claus home too.

Colours.
One day, Red and Blue were arguing about which colour is the best.
Red said, "I get all the attention!" Blue said, "I am the colour of the sea!" All of a sudden, red spilled onto blue.
Purple was born.
From then on, they both agreed that purple was their favourite colour.

Many Kinds of Milk.
At school, Joey's teacher says, "Milk is good for you.
It helps you grow strong." Then she asks, "Do you know where milk comes from?" "Cows, of course!" all the children say.
"Yes, milk can come from cows.
But around the world, people also drink milk from sheep, horses, and camels," says the teacher.
Wow! Joey learns something new.

A Picture for Dad.
I painted a picture of my dad for his birthday.
It was the first time I drew a picture of him.
At the party, I was scared to give it to him.
Why? Because it wasn't very good.
But when my dad saw it, he said that he liked it.
He put it right up on the wall and said, "It looks just like me!"

Basketball Is Fun.
My uncle gave me a basketball for my birthday.
Uncle showed me how to bounce the ball.
At first, I could only bounce the ball a few times.
With practice, I could bounce the ball up to ten, eleven, twelve...
twenty...
thirty...
and one hundred times! I was so excited.
I wish I could put the ball in the net!

Tall Tom.
Tom is very tall.
He is taller than anyone in our class.
He is even taller than our teacher.
Today, our teacher asked us to play a game called Reach High.
Tom raised his hand and all the kids jumped as high as possible.
They tried to reach Tom's hand.
But no one could do it.

Report Card.
Pat stopped working and came out of his office.
He wanted to see what others were doing in the next room.
He told them that his 95-year-old mother still kept his kindergarten report card.
"What did the report card say?" asked one of his friends.
"Stop visiting your neighbours!" said Pat.

Fun at School.
Cory goes to school three days a week.
He learns about letters and numbers.
He plays with his friends.
They play inside when it rains and outside when it is sunny.
It is fun! Next year, he will be five years old.
He will go to school five days a week! He can't wait!

The Sky Is Blue! My uncle sends me a picture.
It's a picture of a blue sky and white clouds.
"I am so happy to see the blue sky!" says my uncle.
I wonder why.
"Isn't the sky always blue?" "No," he says.
"The sky in my city is often grey because there are too many cars." That's why he is so excited!

This is a dog.
It is small and thin.
This is a horse.
It is big and tall.
These are pigs.
They are small and fat.
This is a cow.
It is big and fat.
These are rabbits.
They are short and fat.

Tony is writing about some animals.
Help him complete the sentences.
These baby lions.
They are yellow.
They small thin.
They long tails.
This black and white.
a panda.
It fot It big fat.
It short legs.

it is that is these are they are this is those are Dad: Andy, this is a bear.
Andy: this is big and fat.
Dad: these are pandas.
Andy: they are black and white.
Dad: That is a lion.
Andy: It is big.
Dad: Those are monkeys.
Andy: They are thin.

I love my family.
They always take care of me.
My mother loves to cook delicious food.
I help her prepare the meal.
My father works for the family.
He helps mother too with the dishes and the laundry.
We help each other in everything.
We are a happy and loving family.
My brothers and sisters are also nice to me.

I love reading books.
Every day, I pick up a book and enter a new world.
The stories take me on exciting adventures, and I learn new things.
I like to read in a quiet corner, surrounded by the smell of pages.
The characters become my friends, and their journeys inspire me.
Reading helps me relax and imagine wonderful places.
Whether it's a rainy day or a sunny afternoon, a good book is my perfect companion.

title: Hello! New classmate
content:
Today, our class has a new student, and she comes from Japan.
Her name is Yuki, and she is very friendly.
Everyone in the class welcomed her with smiles and greetings.
At first, Yuki seemed a bit shy, but as the day went on, she started to feel more comfortable.
We helped her with the school routine, showed her around the classroom, and explained things in simple English.

What is a friend ? A friend is someone who is always happy to help when you run into a problem.
A friend is someone who brings out the best in you.
A real friend is someone who cheers you up when you are feeling bad.
True friends advise you and will never turn you down.
Good friends are hard to come by, harder to leave, and impossible to do without.

title: My best friend
content:
A best friend is a person who you value above other friends in your life, someone you have fun with, someone you trust and someone in whom you confide.
The first person you call when you get good news or want to go out for a bite to eat is an example of your best friend.

title: Autumn is coming
content:
Autumn is coming, and I can feel the changes in the air.
The days are getting cooler, and the leaves are starting to change color.
I love the way the trees turn red, orange, and yellow.
It's a beautiful sight! The sound of leaves crunching under my feet is one of my favorite things about autumn.
I also enjoy the cozy feeling of wearing sweaters and drinking hot chocolate.
Autumn is the season of harvest, and I look forward to eating fresh apples and pumpkins.
The days are shorter, but the evenings are perfect for relaxing with a good book.
Autumn brings a peaceful and calm atmosphere that I always enjoy.

title: My Home
content:
My home is a special place.
It's where I feel safe, loved, and happy.
Inside, there are cozy rooms filled with the things I love.
In the living room, we have a big, comfortable couch where my family and I watch movies and play games together.
Our kitchen always smells delicious, with the aroma of my mom's cooking.
My bedroom is my favorite place.
It's where I have my toys, books, and a soft bed.
I like to read bedtime stories there and dream sweet dreams.

title: Wonderful Place
content:
The air is fresh.
I like fresh air.
The trees are green.
The water is clean.
This place is wonderful.
I want to live here.

title: My house
content:
My house is simple but tidy.
There are two rooms.
We have a living room, bathroom and kitchen.
The yard has beautiful flowers and butterflies.
It is so nice to live here.

title: After school
content:
After school, I usually go home with my friends.
We walk together, and sometimes we talk about our day.
When I get home, I have a snack.
My favorite is a peanut butter and jelly sandwich.
It's so yummy! Then, I do my homework.
Sometimes, it's a little tricky, but I always try my best.
I know that doing homework is important.Once my homework is done, I like to play outside.
I ride my bike or play with my dog in the yard.
It's so much fun!

My Sunday I love Sundays! On Sunday, I don't go to school.
So, I usually get up late in the morning.
In the afternoon, I often go out with my family.
We usually go to a park or go shopping.
Every other Sunday, I visit my grandparents.
When I visit them, my grandmother cooks me a delicious meal.
In the evening.
I watch TV or play computer games.
Sunday is fun and relaxing!

The girl is watering the flowers! She is holding a watering can.
She is pouring the water onto the flowers.
The water and sunshine help the flowers grow.

Visit to a farm To roderickoo@pmail.com Subject Visit to a farm Dear Grandpa, We are on a farm now.
I can see some sunflowers and tulips.
They are yellow.
There are some dragonflies in the sky.
Guess what? Mum finds a grasshopper on my shoulder! I can see some goats too.
They have horns and short tails.
I like the ducks and the geese.
They are in the pond.
We have so much fun.
Love, Anna

Dear Alice, How are you? I draw some pictures for you.
They are about my family.
In the first picture, I am cooking an egg and I am happy.
In the second picture, Dad and my sister are fishing.
They catch two fish and one crab.
They are excited! In the third picture, my brother is riding a bike in the park.
He is thirsty.
He wants to drink some water.
In the last picture, my little sister is dancing.
She is singing a song too.
Mum is blowing up a balloon for her.
What do you do with your family? Write back soon.
Best, Franky

Lucy is in her bedroom.
She is looking for her doll.
It is cute.
It is wearing a blouse and a colourful skirt.
The blouse has two pockets.
Lucy is looking at the doll's house.
She finds her yo-yo there.
She finds her doll too! She is happy.

Martin is my classmate.
He is a monitor.
He is six years old.
He has some exercise books.
Miss Chung is my Maths teacher.
She has a marker.
It is blue.
I like Miss Chung.
She is nice.

Apples are red.
They are sweet and crunchy.
Oranges are round and juicy.
Watermelons are round too.
They have small black seeds.

I love watermelons, grapes and blueberries! Watermelons are big.
They are juicy! They have small black seeds.
Grapes are sweet.
Their skins are red, green and purple.
thave eleven blueberries now.
They are round and soft.

title: My Day Off
content:
Saturday and Sunday are my days off.
I don't go to school.
I usually get up at eight o'clock in the morning, do morning exercises and go to the bathroom.
We have breakfast at half past eight.
After breakfast my parents and I go for a walk to the park.
We sometimes play different games there.
In the afternoon we have dinner.
Every Saturday I help my m other about the house.
In the evening we go to the cinema or to the theatre.
I go to bed at half past ten in the evening.

title: My best friend
content:
My name is Maria.
I am nine years old.
I have got one best friend.
She is Alice.
Her hobby is drawing.
Her favourite colour is blue.
She likes eating ice-cream.
I met her two years ago.
We don't fight.
We both live in the same city.
Her house is near the school, but my house is far from school.
Her hair is short and my hair is long.
We share secrets.
She is very humorous.
She always makes me laugh.
She is kind, too.
She likes to share her food with me.
My birthday is on January, 5th and her birthday is on October, 4th.
She is so cute.
She likes to swing and I like to slide.
I feel happy when I am staying with her.
And she feels happy when she is staying with me, too!

title: Sport in My Life
content:
Sport is an important part of my life.
To tell the truth I donâ€™t do sports regularly.
But in the morning I do my exercises.
In summer I go swimming as there is a beautiful lake with pure water where my grandparents live.
I like to ride the bike.
I also enjoy playing badminton, football and volleyball.
In winter I like skating, skiing and tobogganing.
In our school we have a nice gym.
Sports and games are popular among pupils.
A lot of children train at special sport schools.
Doing sports I become strong and healthy.
Sport gives me a lot of joy and pleasure.

title: My Working Day
content:
Every morning I get up at seven o'clock in the morning.
I wash my face, clean my teeth, do morning exercises and get dressed.
At half past seven I have my breakfast.
I usually have a cup of tea and sandwiches for breakfast.
I go to school at a quarter to eight.
I have five or six lessons at school every day.
I come home at three o'clock, have my dinner and do my homework.
At five o'clock I go for a walk with my friends.
In the evening my parents and I have supper.
I always help my mother to do the washing up.
After that I like to watch TV with my father or read books in my room.
I go to bed at ten o'clock in the evening.

title: My Pet
content:
My favourite pet is a parrot.
He is multicoloured: green, yellow, blue and red.
He has a large beak, a short neck, two beautiful wings and a long tail.
He has four toes on each foot two front and two back.
Some parrots live longer than most dogs and birds.
My parrot has a very loud voice.
I teach him to talk.
He knows many words and can talk well.
He is playful, talkative and a great pet.
He lives in the cage.
He can eat almost anything human eats.
I give him food and water every day.
He likes fruit and vegetables.
He likes to chew rubber toys, to fly, play and talk.
I like my parrot because he is funny.
He is a member of our family.

title: School
content:
School is a special place where I learn new things every day.
I have friends, and we study different subjects together.
In the classroom, there are desks, chairs, and a chalkboard where the teacher writes.
We read books, solve math problems, and draw pictures.
During break time, we play games in the schoolyard.
School is fun because I get to discover and explore many exciting ideas with my classmates and teachers.

title: My Hobby
content:
My name is Ann.
I am a pupil.
I am in the fourth form.
I go to school.
When I come home after school I like to read.
My hobby is reading.
I have many friends.
They have hobbies too.
My friend Kate collects shells.
She always brings a lot of beautiful shells from the seaside.
My friend Sasha collects coins.
He has a big collection of coins.
His father brings him coins from different countries.

title: My School
content:
I like going to school.
My school is quite near my house.
It is a large, two-story building with a big playground in front of it.
The office is on the ground floor, and the staff room is on the first floor.
The principal's office is next to the staff room.
There are, in all, twenty-three teachers in our school.
My classroom is on the second floor.
There are twelve classrooms in all.
There is also a small library and a laboratory.
Assembly is held on the grounds.
When it rains, we say our prayers in the classroom.
Our annual function and sports events are held on the ground.
These events are most exciting.
School is great fun, indeed!
sing a song draw a picture tell a story

title: a toe
content:
a finger
an ear
a mouth
a leg
a head
a hand
an arm
a foot
feet

title: What is that?
content:
It is a tiger.
That is a panda.
It is fat.
What are those?
They are elephants.
They are thin.
Those are lions.
They are small.
This is a bear.

title: short
content:
tall
thin
fat
small
big
a panda
a lion
a bear
animals

title: Car
content:
My car.
This is my car.
My car is big.

title: Pan
content:
My pan.
My pan is small.

title: Pan
content:
My pan.
My pan is big.

title: Book
content:
A book.
This is a Book.

Uncle John Loves to Ski.
Uncle John loves to ski.
In winter, he goes skiing on the snow.
It's his favourite sport.
What does he love to do in summer? He likes to ski too.
How can he ski in summer? He goes water skiing.
It's a lot of fun.
Summer or winter, on snow or water, Uncle John loves to ski.
